snippet: An eight-bedroom family home that is currently operating as a hotel and restaurant in the village of Apoldu de Sus in Transylvania, is on the market for $467,000.
lead_paragraph: An eight-bedroom family home that is currently operating as a hotel and restaurant in the village of Apoldu de Sus in Transylvania, is on the market for $467,000.

headline.main: An Eight-Bedroom House in Central Romania
